body:
I saved this about three days ago and I had about 20 pages worth of favorites piled over it since...that's 400 doujin's...wtf! 
I looked for it because of the last image of the first chapter which embedded in my mind. It was hot.
This was a fucking great read. I wish the first one showed a few more pages with the mother and daughter getting tag-teamed by those guys.
All the chapter are pretty good with sweet sweet vanilla stories. Anal is a nice touch.
The first chapter is great. Then the one about the orgy club members that turn out to be teacher and student was pretty amazing. 
The female school Doctor story and the female manager story were pretty good too. The incest story was also good.
Great artwork, I fucking love this art style 6/10
